text: Joaquín Madrigal (born 17 December 1934) is a Mexican equestrian. He competed in two events at the 1964 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Mexico Category:Equestrians at the 1964 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Joaquín Madrigal
